q:
In Data Structures, you are working on Arrays. You are given a Pseudocode that implements various operations on the given array. If you are required to execute the following pseudocode in a programming language then what will be the output?

DECLARE arr : ARRAY[0,8] of { 2, 4, 7, 10, 14, 27, 39, 52, 67 }
lo = 0
hi = 8
k=52
count = 0

WHILE lo < hi
	count = count + 1
	m=(lo + hi)/2
	IF arr[m]==k
		BREAK
	ELSE IF arr[m]<k
		lo = m + 1
	ELSE
		hi = m - 1
	ENDIF
ENDWHILE

PRINT count

If you are required to perform the following operationsÂ then what will be the final value of the variable count, after performing the operations?
